content.title: Venous Outflow Testing
content.description: Methods for assessing venous outflow obstruction

key_concepts.details: Measures calf volume changes with calibrated cuff inflation/deflation
Percentage of venous volume expelled in first second after cuff release
Alternative method using limb circumference changes
Reduced outflow suggests proximal obstruction (DVT, May-Thurner)

content.statement: Venous Outflow Testing is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Diagnostics that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Venous Outflow Testing helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Venous Outflow Testing include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Venous Outflow Testing.

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). Venous Outflow Testing. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
